extension.name: OsProperty Ajax Search
extension.author: Ossolution
extension.description: A module allow customer can search properties through Ajax method. You need also to extension component osproperty. This module is included in the package.

field.name: number_item
field.label: Properties per search item
field.description: Number properties per search item(category, property type, country) at the dropdown result

field.name: number_characters
field.label: Min characters to search
field.description: Number characters that user should type if they want the search system work

field.name: ordering
field.label: Search according by
field.description: Please select 'Search according by' field. The ajax search module will search properties through this field

field.name: show_introtext
field.label: Show small description
field.description: Show small description in the Search result

field.name: show_address
field.label: Show address
field.description: Show address in the Search result

field.name: show_cost
field.label: Show price
field.description: Show property's price in the search result

field.name: show_agent
field.label: Show agent/owner
field.description: Show agent/ owner name in the search result

field.name: search_name
field.label: Search property title
field.description: Do you want the search module to search through property title

field.name: search_desc
field.label: Search property desc
field.description: Do you want the search module to search through property description

field.name: search_address
field.label: Search property address
field.description: Do you want the search module to search through property's address

field.name: search_agent
field.label: Search agent/owner name
field.description: Do you want the search module to search through agent/ owner name

field.name: use_ssl
field.label: Use SSL
field.description: Are you using Ajax search module in SSL mode
